controllers

Class AddHospitalStaffController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.AddHospitalStaffController

  • @PUBLICAPI
public class AddHospitalStaffController
extends java.lang.Object
    Use this controller to add new staff to the hospital.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AddHospitalStaffController(LoginController loginController)
      Default constructor.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • AddHospitalStaffController

        @PUBLICAPI
public AddHospitalStaffController(LoginController loginController)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        loginController - The login controller of the user trying to add staff to the hospital.
        Throws:
        exceptions.InvalidLoginControllerException - If the user who owns the given login controller is not a hospital administrator or if the login controller is invalid in another way.
        exceptions.InvalidHospitalException
        See Also:
        HospitalController, NeedsLoginController

    • Method Detail

      • addStaff

        @PUBLICAPI
public void addStaff(users.UserFactory userFactory)
        Adds a new user to the hospital from the given user factory.
        Parameters:
        userFactory - The factory you used to initialise the settings of the user you want to be added to this hospital.
        Throws:
        exceptions.UserAlreadyExistsException - If the user you're trying to create already exists (if their name is already registered to another user).
        exceptions.InvalidNameException - If the name you've set in the factory is an invalid one.
        exceptions.InvalidLocationException - If the location you've set in the factory is an invalid one.
        exceptions.InvalidUserFactory

      • getFactories

        @PUBLICAPI
public java.util.Collection getFactories()
        Returns:
        All factories that allow you to create users.

      • getLocations

        @PUBLICAPI
public java.util.Collection<CampusIN> getLocations()
        Returns:
        All locations in this hospital.
